name: Embower
description:
Embower is a 2D platformer about a young boy who travels the world of Ustrianata to purify trees of toxins by hugging their hearts!

Play as Clay, who has the power to throw a crystal and propel himself towards it. Throw the crystal at corrupted animals and objects to glide towards them and give them a hug to save their hearts! :^)

There are currently three playable levels, with a boss battle soon to come.

This is Version 1.0.0. The game is still in development, so be on the look out for the completed version! I would love anyone's feedback on the current level design / game design, as I am still tweaking it to be better.

FUTURE FIXES:

  • All art assets are being revisited
  • Graphics in narrative opening are being redone
  • Narrative is being revisited and tweaked
  • All code is under revision

CURRENT BUGS:

  • If Clay disappears and is deleted, just close the game and start again (lmao I'm sorry, this is our worst bug atm)
  • When Clay dies, game will freeze for a few seconds before he respawns
